meanings.sent1: He tied a tight knot at the aiglet of his shoelace to prevent it from coming undone.
meanings.sent2: The aiglet of her shoelace had a small frayed edge from frequent use.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the aiglet as a tiny swing, entertaining the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the aiglet that pulled her through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, he replaced the worn aiglet with a shiny new one, ready to go.
